resources.string: World\'s airdrops in one place, for free

Airdrops are a distribution of cryptocurrencies for free. \n new projects come out every once in a while, and developers want to get attention, attract investors and build a community for their project. Therefore they may decide to distribute a small amount of their token by doing different things to promote the marketing of their project

string.name: join_airdrop_title
string.b: I want to join an airdrop, what do I need to do?

resources.string: Each project have their own airdrop requirements. some may require you to only join a telegram group,\n others may require you to like them on social media or fill an online form. It is important to note that some airdrops restrict their users, meaning that you can apply for the airdrop only if you meet a certain requirements.\nfor example, a project may require you to live in a certain country, like the USA.

string.name: tokens_purpose_title
string.b: What can I do with tokens?

resources.string: Your tokens worth money. you can either sell them upon receiving them in cryptocurrency exchanges that lists them or in person to any potential buyer\n You can wait until the tokens value will raise and sell them at a higher price, if you believe in the project

string.name: airdrop_reward_title
string.b: How much tokens do I get?

resources.string: Each airdrop will give you different amount of tokens. what is important is not the amount of tokens you get,\n but the total value of the tokens, so you get as much money as possible.

string.name: airdrop_scams_title
string.b: Can I register to an airdrop and not get my tokens?

resources.string:
It is possible that you would fill the airdrop requirements and not get your tokens.
however,by using this app, a few steps are taken to combat these scam airdrops:
*all our airdrops are going through inspection process before published.
*We encourage you to report a scam airdrop
*We are also working on implementing different strategies to track airdrop rewards, so stay tuned.
We have made sure that ads in our app be with as little distraction as possible.\nIn the current version you can\'t disable ads,you will, however, be able to disable ads entirely in future releases

Bitcoin is a consensus network that enables a new payment system and a completely
 digital money. It is the first decentralized peer-to-peer payment network that is
 powered by its users with no central authority or middlemen. From a user perspective, Bitcoin is pretty much
 like cash for the Internet. Bitcoin can also be seen as the most prominent triple entry
 bookkeeping system in existence.
